meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7974.

td.p: Gregory Bodkin, an institutional development manager from Brooklyn, New York
Samantha Merwin, a graduate student from Irvine, California
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 10-day cash winnings total $697,787)

tr.td: ANAGRAMMED TV TITLES
AROUND THE HOUSE
PET SOUNDS
THE AUNT HILL
NEXT YEAR
IN JERUSALEM

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: If you paid close attention to the last part of the clue, "C. King", it would have helped you immensely.)
...
(Alex: [To James] C. King. The Sea King.)
(James: Thank you for bad movie night, honey.)
(Alex: What\'s this?)
(James: I\'m thanking my wife for bad movie night.)
(Alex: Okay. Now, Katie and Jo Jo are...)
(James: Niece and nephew.)
GregoryWho Batman
$4,000
SamanthaWho is Superman???
$6,601
JamesWho is Aquaman? Hi Katie & Jo Jo ♥
$26,308
Aquaman')
